title: account pbe
body: Can anyone give me or exchange a pbe account?please{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Account Sharing (even for the PBE) is against our Terms of Use and may get your live and PBE accounts banned.  I highly recommend not trying to do so.  If you applied for the PBE already, just sit tight and hopefully you'll get accepted soon!

Don't worry, Taliyah will understand if you don't get to play her until she's live :D

> Account Sharing (even for the PBE) is against our Terms of Use and may get your live and PBE accounts banned. I highly recommend not trying to do so. If you applied for the PBE already, just sit tight and hopefully you'll get accepted soon!

> Don't worry, Taliyah will understand if you don't get to play her until she's live :D

I've been waiting for over a year to gain acceptance into the PBE server while my friends just apply and get in one week later. Can't there be a way to re--apply because I'm pretty sure that waiting this long means I will never get in nor have the opportunity to get in. Just being realistic.
I've been waiting for pbe access for almost 2 years now. im even a Zyra main and still nothin for the updates. was probably the most frustrating thing ever.

I understand this player's frustrations, I've been signed up for the PBE since early season 2 and still haven't gotten in. I've checked with player support and all they've told me is that I'm fully eligible and they have no idea why I haven't gotten in yet, even though friends who recently got 30 have accounts. 

The urge to do what the OP is saying gets a bit tempting in these circumstances.
i've just stopped holding my breath. The biggest thing to me is like, give me a yes or no. If i'm not getting a pbe account, fucking tell me, don't just leave me in the dark for years.
ok ... thank you very much for answering
